’inavayan! pungsalra ta lra!: maranger u diya mena’u da kumuda na valray, rengayaw ku lra.

’inavayan! pungsalra ta lra!: pavaveriyas ku lra nu aydan kanu da paysu?

’inavayan! pungsalra ta lra!: pavaveriyas u lra nu aydan kaningku na paysu?
When are you going to pay me back?

I will return it to you tomorrow.

’inavayan! pungsalra ta lra!: pavaveriyas u lra nu aydan kaningku na valray?
When are you going to return my book?

Didn't I return it to you yesterday?

’inavayan! pungsalra ta lra!: ai, kayku diya kiverasa.
Okay, I'll borrow it.

’inavayan! pungsalra ta lra!: uwa paveriyasu da paysu kaningku kuwayu i Rumi.
Go tell Rumi to give me my money back.

How much does she owe you?

Where are you going?

I’m going to plant vegetables in the garden.

What are you doing?

There's too much grass, I'm cutting it, I'll have to water it later.
大家好。我們開始了。: 草太多了，我在砍草，等一下要澆水。

Where did you put it?

Put it next to the plow rake.

Did you turn over the soil?

I just turned over the soil, and so on to sow seeds.
大家好。我們開始了。: 我剛翻過土，等等要播種。

’inavayan! pungsalra ta lra!: karuwa ta lra kikulang kananu sinareman na kulang?
Are your vegetables ready to be harvested?

Will you help me with the barn?

Are there many fish here?

I shoot fish with a spear.

Do you use a bow and arrow when hunting?

i eman idu na vavayan?
